company.name: Agrishan Limited
company.tagline: Your trusted partner in agricultural solutions and sustainable farming

projects.title: Modern Greenhouse Installation
projects.description: Installation of a 2-acre modern greenhouse with automated irrigation systems and climate control, increasing crop yield by 150%

projects.title: Drip Irrigation System
projects.description: Complete drip irrigation setup for a 5-acre horticultural farm, reducing water usage by 60% while improving crop quality

projects.title: Borehole Drilling Project
projects.description: 200-meter deep borehole with solar-powered pump installation, providing sustainable water access to a 50-acre farm

projects.title: Smart Farming Implementation
projects.description: Implementation of IoT sensors and automated systems for precision farming, resulting in 40% reduction in input costs

testimonials.name: John Kamau
testimonials.content: The drip irrigation system installed by Agrishan has transformed our farm. Water efficiency improved dramatically, and our crop yield increased by 80%. Their expertise and professional service are unmatched.

testimonials.name: Sarah Mwangi
testimonials.content: Agrishan's greenhouse construction expertise is exceptional. The structure has helped us extend our growing season and increase production. Their after-sales support is outstanding.

testimonials.name: David Ochieng
testimonials.content: As an agricultural consultant, I've worked with many providers, but Agrishan stands out. Their technical expertise and commitment to quality have helped numerous farms improve yields significantly.
